title: 93/167/Euratom, EEC: Council Decision of 15 March 1993 adapting Decision 90/221/Euratom, EEC concerning the Framework Programme of Community activities in the field of research and technological development (1990 to 1994)
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 15 March 1993 adapting Decision 90/221/Euratom,  EEC concerning the Framework Programme of Community activities in the field of research and  technological development (1990 to 1994)
(93/167/Euratom, EEC)THE COUNCIL OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 90/221/Euratom, EEC is hereby amended as follows:
-  in Article 1 (3) the figure '5  700` shall be replaced by '6  600` and the figure '3  200` by '4   100`,
-  in the second subparagraph of Article 4, the figure '57` shall be replaced by '66`,
-  Annex I shall be replaced by that appearing in the Annex to this Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 March 1993.
For the Council The President M. JELVED
